# Railway Environment Variables Setup
# Copy and paste these into Railway project Variables

# Security (REQUIRED - Generate your own!)
JWT_SECRET=your_super_strong_random_jwt_secret_minimum_64_characters_long_change_this_now

# Email Configuration (REQUIRED)
EMAIL_SERVICE=gmail
EMAIL_USER=your_email@gmail.com
EMAIL_PASS=your_gmail_app_password_16_chars
RECIPIENT_EMAIL=contact@yourdomain.com

# Application Settings
NODE_ENV=production
PORT=3001

# Frontend URL (update after Vercel deployment)
FRONTEND_URL=https://your-app.vercel.app

# Database variables are auto-generated by Railway:
# MYSQLHOST, MYSQLUSER, MYSQLPASSWORD, MYSQLDATABASE, MYSQLPORT
